item.description: An application used by citizens to locate the polling place where ballots can be cast on Election Day.
item.snippet: An application used by citizens to locate the polling place where ballots can be cast on Election Day.
item.title: Election Polling Places

popupInfo.description: Review a Sample Ballot

expressionInfos.name: expr4

about.aboutContent:
Election Polling Places can be used by citizens to locate the polling place where ballots can be cast on election day.

Each polling place is usually located in a public facility and used to gather and count ballots during election day. They are open during specified hours depending on the type of election, this information is presented to users when they find the voting precinct they reside in, and it's polling place.

Search for an address / facility in the search bar, or click a location directly on the map to define the location of your residence. Select the Directions tab to view driving directions to the polling place from the defined location.

data.subtitle: ...find election day polling places in my community
data.title: Election Polling Places

expressionInfos.title: EarlyVotingWaitTimes

about.aboutContent:
Early Voting can be used by citizens to locate the nearest voting centers where ballots can be cast in person or by mail.

Early voting locations allow participation by voters who may not be able to vote on the set election day or days. Hours of operation for each early voting center vary and is presented to users when they find a location near their home or place of business.

Adjust the slider to the desired buffer distance. Search for an address / facility in the search bar, or click a location directly on the map to define the location to be buffered. Click a layer in the list of results and click the voting center you are interested in. Select the Directions tab to view driving directions to the voting center from the defined location.

config.editorDescription: Search for an address or locate on map

about.aboutContent:
My Elected Representative can be used by citizens to determine who represents them in local, state, and federal elected offices. This application can be accessed from a smartphone, tablet, and desktop computer.

Search for an address in the search bar, or click a location directly on the map to define an area of interest.Click an elected office in the list of results to view elected representative information.
